channel.title: "attack option"
channel.description:
on my server when we are in wild, there is no attack option. there is an attack option when you right click the person but the attack option is at the bottom when you right click so its like when you right click it says... "walk here *name" "attack *name" "trade *name"
how do i make an attack option that actually works lol..

item.title: "attack option"
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

no, the attack option is everywhere, and it does nothing…if you click it it does nothing at all nothing even if in wild
